tmiranda.mus
Class Plugin

java.lang.Object
  tmiranda.mus.Plugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
sage.SageTVEventListener, sage.SageTVPlugin
public class Plugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements sage.SageTVPlugin, sage.SageTVEventListener

This is the Plugin Implementation Class for a SageTV Plugin.
